H0.text: On 31 May 2010, the President of which country announced his resignation after local politicians criticised comments he made in relation to overseas military deployments. Kyrgyzstan

H1.text: On 31 May 2010, the President of which country announced his resignation after local politicians criticised comments he made in relation to overseas military deployments. Poland

H2.text: On 31 May 2010, the President of which country announced his resignation after local politicians criticised comments he made in relation to overseas military deployments. Afghanistan

H3.text: On 31 May 2010, the President of which country announced his resignation after local politicians criticised comments he made in relation to overseas military deployments. Nimska

A4.text: On 15 April 2010, at 19:00, Bakiyev left Kyrgyzstan for Kazakhstan, having signed a resignation letter.
